alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lawrence; Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 3:10PM MDT until June 20 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Northwestern Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Southern Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... Southwestern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 310 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles northwest of Crooks Tower to 5 miles west of Bear Mountain Lookout to 3 miles south of Jewel Cave National Monument, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Bear Mountain Lookout, Black Fox Campground and Deerfield Reservoir around 315 PM MDT. Medicine Mountain around 320 PM MDT. Custer, Hill City, Mystic, Roubaix Lake and Crazy Horse Memorial around 325 PM MDT. Silver City, Brownsville, Stockade Lake, Sylvan Lake, northern Custer State Park, Black Elk Peak and Palmer Gulch Resort around 330 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 33 and 70. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
